name: The Cloud Business
description:
Welcome to Cloud Bussiness Introduction

You are a new cloud in the factory, your job is to water as many plants as possible, but be careful the plants need to be watered with a special color so you should remember the previous instructions to succed!

You can have a look at the code in GitHub!

Controls

Up / Down (Arrow Keys) -> Change Water Color

X -> Rain

P->Pause

Special Thanks

Pordrack for the nice comments and feedback

Alfedi, DiegoMC9 and rapsaGnauj for testing, feedback and motivate me <3
